segments.text: I notice the boy is just standing there on that wobbly stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks so determined, like he's on a mission or something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if he knows how dangerous it is to be standing on that stool like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He seems completely focused on getting those cookies, like nothing else matters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think it's cute how he's just standing there, reaching for the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall off the stool while trying to get the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks like he's having a great time, even if he is being a bit sneaky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if his mom will notice what he's doing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bit funny how absorbed he is in his little cookie mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think he's quite clever, actually, standing on that stool like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how many cookies he's already eaten.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He seems like he's really enjoying himself, even if he is being a bit naughty.
segments.speaker: PAR
